#summary infoList.
#labels free,cms,freecms,freeteam,开源,免费,内容管理系统,infoList

					<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">3 发布时间降序</span></p>
				<p>

					<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">返回值</span></p>

				<p>
					<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">说明</span></p>

			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">info</span></p>
			</td>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">信息对象，类型为数据对象info</span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">index</span></p>
			</td>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">索引</span></p>

	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">示例1</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">根据站点id和栏目id提取信息。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">&lt;@infoList siteid=&quot;${site.id}&quot; channelid=&quot;6555dd8b-7acc-4e57-a19a-cc70dd4f7135&quot; num=&quot;2&quot; titleLen=&quot;15&quot;; info&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">   &lt;H1 &gt; &lt;a href=&quot;${info.pageurl}&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot;&gt;${info.showtitle}&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/H1&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">&lt;/@infoList&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1105/081948_DODa_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1105/081948_DODa_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">示例2</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">根据站点id和栏目页面标识提取信息。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">&lt;@infoList siteid=&quot;${site.id}&quot; channelPagemark=&quot;</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">动态</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">&quot; num=&quot;2&quot; titleLen=&quot;15&quot;; info,index&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">   &lt;H1 &gt; ${index+1} . &lt;a href=&quot;${info.pageurl}&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot;&gt;${info.showtitle}&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/H1&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">&lt;/@infoList&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1105/082007_EUEt_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1105/082007_EUEt_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">示例3</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">根据站点id和栏目页面标识提取图片信息。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">&lt;@infoList siteid=&quot;${site.id}&quot; channelPagemark=&quot;</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">动态</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">&quot; num=&quot;2&quot; titleLen=&quot;15&quot; img=&quot;1&quot;; info,index&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">   &lt;li &gt; &lt;a href=&quot;${info.pageurl}&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot;&gt;&lt;img src=&quot;${info.img}&quot;&gt;${info.showtitle}&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">&lt;/@infoList&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1105/082024_1gwj_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1105/082024_1gwj_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">示例4</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">根据站点id和栏目页面标识提取信息，并设置其它参数。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">&lt;@infoList siteid=&quot;${site.id}&quot; channelPagemark=&quot;</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">动态</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">&quot; num=&quot;2&quot; titleLen=&quot;15&quot; order=&quot;2&quot; hot=&quot;1&quot; dateFormat=&quot;yyyy-MM-dd&quot;; info,index&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">   &lt;li&gt; ${index+1} . &lt;a href=&quot;${info.pageurl}&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot;&gt;${info.showtitle}&lt;/a&gt;[${info.addtimeStr}]&lt;/li&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">&lt;/@infoList&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1105/082045_RhmW_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1105/082045_RhmW_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
